faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to your inquiries about the Screen Recorder

items.title: Can I record my entire screen or just a portion?
items.description: Yes! You can choose to record your entire screen or select a specific region for targeted recordings.

items.title: Is there a time limit for recordings?
items.description: No, you can record for as long as you need! Just ensure you have enough storage space.

items.title: Can I include audio in my recordings?
items.description: Absolutely! You can record your system's audio and your voice, making it perfect for tutorials or commentary.

items.title: What formats can I save my recordings in?
items.description: You can save your recordings in popular formats such as MP4, AVI, and MOV, giving you flexibility for sharing.
